Description: Maximum m/z difference (ppm) between precursor ions in MS1 and MS2.
Maximum RT difference (s) between the MS1 spectrum and MS2 spectrum.
Minimum intensity to be considered as a peak.
Minimum intensity to be considered as a signal.
Maximum uncertainty to tolerate in a peak.
Minimum relatve intensity in the spectrum to be used in the fragments networks.
Minimum number of signals to consider a cluster as a peak.
Minimum fraction of the total signal intensity that should be considered by the fragments networks
